metadata.title: Maidenform Pure Comfort Lace Bralette, Padded Wireless Bra, Convertible Longline Halter Bralette with Soft Foam Cups
features: LONGLINE STYLING – Longline lace front with soft foam cups and side boning for support.
WEAR 3 WAYS – Convertible, adjustable straps for switching from a traditional straight silhouette to a crisscross back to a halter.
COOL MESH – Mesh sides and back stretch with ease and keep you cool.
PRETTY SCALLOPED EDGING – Plunging neckline and front edge with pretty scalloped detailing.
WEAR UNDER ANYTHING – Convertible straps and a choice of colors and prints for wearing anywhere.
NO-PINCH CLOSURE – Brushed hook-and-eye back closure for no-pinch comfort.
QUALITY FABRIC – Our convertible bralette has cups and front stretch lace of 90% nylon/10% spandex and sides and back of cool, stretch 74% nylon/26% spandex mesh.
description: Versatility and comfort go hand-in-hand in this lace bralette from the Pure Comfort collection. Soft foam cups provide comfortable support. The beauty of this longline bralette is how its adjustable straps convert from traditional straight to halter to crisscross wear, so it works easily under all your clothes. The longline design has a plunging, scallop-edged neckline and a pretty lace front with cool mesh sides and back. For added support, its longline frame has side boning that helps hold you in place. And it comes in multiple sizes and colors, including one fun animal print, to fit every shape and taste. In sizes 34A-40D.
